text: Nyang taseumah nyan raya that salah Taseumah patong nyang bukon Tuhan Meu sapeue pih tan na jeuet jipeugah Tapeuna-peuna salah raya that Nyang kon Hadharat bandum taseumah Han ek meu sapeue jibri keu gata Raseuki gata sideh bak Allah Raseuki gata lakee bak Tuhan Teuma Droeneuh nyan mantong taseumah Chukor keu Tuhan teuma bek laloe Keudeh dum tawoe keupada Allah
